price: Maaltu isiniif jiraayi guddina Rabbii hin sodaanne?
arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillahi waqāran
